Name: Daylight saving time.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to daylight saving time.

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Governmental Operations

Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

	Section 1. Section 2-106 of the administrative code of the city of New York is REPEALED.
	Â§2. This local law shall take effect immediately.
